tool_description: Download map tiles for offline use (intranet, offline devices).  You can store those downloaded tiles as long as you want.
name: Offline MapTiles
title: Offline MapTiles

api_list.name: /local/osm/v1/{z}/{x}/{y}.png
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://offline-maptiles.p.rapidapi.com/local/osm/v1/3/6/3.png"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "offline-maptiles.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
